notes: [^1] Edge case values such as r=1 and s=0 can lead to forgeries if the ECDSA implementation does not check boundaries and computes s^(-1)==0.
[^2] Some implementations of ECDSA do not handle duplication and points at infinity correctly. This is a test vector that has been specially crafted to check for such an omission.
